entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 5:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -34.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -38.4°C
Wind: W 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
